level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: ยง 27-2020 Definitions. When used in this article: (a) Organic wastes shall mean all wastes produced by or from living organisms. (b) Inorganic wastes shall mean all wastes other than organic wastes, including discarded lumber, wood shavings and furniture. (c) Household wastes shall mean all wastes, organic and inorganic, which are produced within a dwelling unit.
